title: Scheduled Return to Chloramine Water Disinfectant (City of Corpus Christi, TX)
text: ( Source : City of Corpus Christi , TX) The City of Corpus Christi will be changing back to chloramine disinfectant on November 2 , 2015 after an alternative disinfectant has stabilized the water system. This change is intended to benefit our
